snippet.title: Legends of the Round Table - Official Combat Preview | Turn-Based Strategic RPG
snippet.description:
Game director Yan Pepin dives into the deep combat systems in Legends of the Round Table. 

From the rules of chivalry to the code of honor affecting every move, the game's tactical turn-based combat offers a unique take on battles in strategic RPGs.

👑Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/LotRTCombat
💬Discord: https://roundtablegame.com/Discord

00:00 Overview 
00:41 Cards system ​
00:57 Horseback combat ​
01:12 Honor System ​
01:30 Mercy & Ransoms ​
02:12 Conclusion 

Follow us on Socials! 
https://linktr.ee/ArtificeStudio
